title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not show up in the Available Items sector.
OB: When expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon in the Available Items sector, the column icons do not appear.
EB: Expected behavior is that when expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon in the Available Items sector, both table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Available Items sector.
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
3. Check if the column icons appear or not.
